column26: {a man I know walks the streets alone=he is crying=sheltered by the rain=hes got a heart of gold in a beaten soul=and he is dying=eaten by the pain=a voice in the dark and I turn around=someone is smiling=but the smile on his face aint his own=but I said}

column10: {open your eyes=he has done nothing wrong=he just did what he know was right=he banged the doors=he tooke the fight=where were we=when he needed us most}

column18: {Judgement day=I hear my concience calling=Judgement day=don't turn our backs no more=Judgement day=Ifeel my tears are falling=Judgement day=we will all stand alone}
